name: livetasks
description: global installer for the Livetasks project
author: Sharlaan <raphael.morineau@gmail.com>

scripts.tremovedb: psql -U postgres -d livetasks -c "SELECT pg_terminate_backend(pg_stat_activity.pid) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE pg_stat_activity.datname = 'livetasks'" -d postgres -c "DROP DATABASE livetasks"
scripts.install:api: start  cd server  &&  yarn  &&  yarn start
scripts.install:webapp: start  cd client  &&  yarn  &&  yarn start
